title: 3 and Out  - Sark SMH + Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out  - Sark SMH + Weekend Mailbag
description:
Heading into NFL Week 7, John starts with his take on Steve Sarkisian blowing it on the road against Oklahoma State, and Brian Kelly quickly putting it together at LSU. Then, he answers listener questions and empties out the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
